content.rendered:
Lakeland Holiday Day Camps Program

Our Lakeland holiday Day Camps are full of field activities, martial arts and dance.  We are not a day care, but we do provide full day camps during summer and school breaks where your children can learn and grow.

When you typically have your kids in school, spring breaks, fall breaks, holidays, teacher work days, and other school closings can affect your ability to earn a living. Sifu Och Wing Chun’s Lakeland holiday day camps program provides a place where your children can learn valuable skills while helping your scheduling needs. Sign Up Now

Get Started Now with a 2 Week Trial!

2 WEEK FREE TRIAL & Access to our full schedule

Fill out the form below to get 2 FREE weeks of training at our downtown lakeland facility and access to our full class schedule!

Day camps in lakeland florida

Our holiday Day Camps program is already a part of our Lakeland after school martial arts program, but you can also block out days of the year so that you’re all set when the schedule shifts and you need someone to care for your kids during those non-school days. If you live in Lakeland, Florida there’s no better place for your kids to learn discipline.  Participate in character-building programs and pick up some helpful self-defense.  While being taught by a professional team of instructors and teachers.

Contact Now to Learn More

Choose Sifu Och and Just Dance school break camps

Lakeland Wing Chun has partnered with Just Dance to deliver an incredibly robust and fun holiday day camps program along with an after school program that is unlike anything else in town. The kids martial arts classes are taught by internationally-trained Wing Chun Kung Fu instructor, Sifu Justin Och. Our holiday day camps program teaches crucial life skills and delivers plenty of exercise and fun at the same time. Sign Up Now. Our Lakeland Holiday Day Camps Program Features:

  • Confident Martial Arts Training
  • Anti-bullying techniques
  • Boost respect, self esteem
  • Convenient hours, all-day schedule
  • Fine arts, dance, hip hop
  • Etiquette and music classes
Get Started Now with a 2 Week Trial!

“I highly recommend this place! Both my 11 year olds go here. One for kickboxing and one for kids martial arts. They ACTUALLY care about the wellbeing of my kids and have offered help anyway they can.”

— Kayla D,

(parent of students)

Professional Instructors in Their Fields of Expertise

At our holiday Day Camps your child is cared for, and our trained teachers and instructors encourage and engage them through structured classes, advanced skills classes, and fun group programs designed to entertain and educate. Among our classes your child will learn elements of kung fu, karate, tae kwon do, and boxing.

In order to teach self defense we must also teach self discipline.  We work with our students to increase their understanding.  Your child’s ability, safety, self esteem, and respect is the utmost concern to us. All while teaching them skills that will stick with them for the rest of their lives.

Sign Up for Our 2 Week Trial Today

Holiday day camps in Lakeland Fl

Sifu Och Wing Chun is unique in that it promotes discipline and self control.  Furthermore, good practices are encouraged at home, like doing chores and showing respect. We have professional caring instructors that are seasoned and certified in their fields of expertise. Sifu Och Wing Chun’s holiday day camps even feature on staff tutors and a Polk County teacher who assists and personally helps each child with their homework and study needs. Sign Up Now

All offered all in one location.
– dance, hip hop, ballroom
– theatre, painting, etiquette
– martial arts, kung fu
– karate, kickboxing

Get Started Now with a 2 Week Trial!

“When my son first started coming here he cried so much and had no interest in participating with the class. The teachers were always patient and talked him through it. He loves his class now and always looks forward to going.”

— Ashley V,

(parent of student)

BUILD UNLIMITED POTENTIAL KIDS MARTIAL ARTS CLASSES

We focus on real-world results while encouraging kids, adults, families, and individuals through both group and private lessons. Dedicated students interested in learning the entire system of Wing Chun Kung Fu, self defense, cardio kickboxing, kids martial arts, after school pickup programs, and no-gi Jiujitsu are welcome to join any one of our many programs. We are one big martial arts family—training, socializing, and making friends of all ages.

Start now by signing up to our two week training trial with the form below!
